level.text: The Department may charge fees for floodplain management services as listed below:
Determination of a designated Zone in FIRMs for a given site or address and/or the Base Flood Elevation (BFE) if available
Review and approval of small floodplain studies and/or reports, or the request for a single-lot map amendment (e.g., LOMA and CLOMA); Elevation Certificate; Floodproofing Certificate
Review and approval of necessary floodplain studies and/or reports for up to one (1) crossing structure
$ 3,000.00 plus $ 500.00 per additional bridge/ culvert, channel, levee, berm, dam, or other structure
Review the request for FEMA maps change (e.g., CLOMR, LOMR, CLOMR-F, LOMR-F) as part of the minor or major floodplain study/report.
Source: Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 57 DCR 10782 (November 19, 2010).
